title: Mitigating CVE-2021-41773: Apache HTTP Server Path Traversal
description: On September 29, Ash Daulton, along with the cPanel Security Team, reported a path traversal and file disclosure vulnerability in Apache HTTP Server 2.4.29 to the Apache security team. The issue was fixed within two days, under CVE-2021-41773, and the patch was released on October 4. Apache urged to deploy the fix, as it is already being actively exploited.
author: Assaf Vilmovsky  & Maxim Zavodchik
